data.persona: I and my friends are here with our mothers waving goodbye to the men going off to fight. I have only seen six winters, but I am afraid that the wolves will come this year. I hope my father and uncles come back from the wolf hunt - my uncle promised me a wolf's tooth.
data.description:
You are in the Outside Castle.
The outside castle is beautifully decorated with priceless gems and artifacts. The stone used is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver. The gardens outside the castle are a beautiful green and have the most delightful flowers.
There's a The garden, a The drawbridge to the castle., a flower, a stone, and a The outside castle here.
The a fellow traveler. is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a polishing cloths and a rough clothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal food from the fellow traveler
data.mid_motivation: I hope to eat my fill today
data.long_motivation: I want to be able to meet my father and uncles when they finally return
